DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate exposure rifabutin ( RIB ) administer atazanavir ritonavir ( ATV/RTV )
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 18 50 year old body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/mÂ² Prior enrollment , subject must physical laboratory test finding within normal limit , woman childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) must negative pregnancy test Any significant acute chronic medical illness Evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) clinical laboratory determination Use prescription drug overthecounter acid controller within 4 week prior study drug administration Use drug , include overthecounter medication herbal preparation within 1 week prior study drug administration
